mapper.select: select * from member order by mem_idx
select * from member where mem_idx=#{ mem_idx }
select * from member where mem_id=#{ mem_id }
mapper.insert: insert into member values(null, #{ mem_name }, #{ mem_id }, #{ mem_pwd }, #{ mem_zipcode }, #{ mem_addr }, #{ mem_ip }, default, default)
mapper.delete: delete from member where mem_idx=#{ mem_idx }
mapper.update: update member set mem_name=#{ mem_name }, mem_id=#{ mem_id }, mem_pwd=#{ mem_pwd }, mem_zipcode=#{ mem_zipcode }, mem_addr=#{ mem_addr }, mem_grade=#{ mem_grade } where mem_idx=#{ mem_idx }
